verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David הֲכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> Is there yet ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> anyone נוֹתַ֖ר <S%H3498><s%> any that is left לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְאֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> that I may shew עִמּוֹ֙ <S%H5973><s%> with חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> him kindness בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> for יְהוֹנָתָֽן׃ <S%H3083><s%> for Jonathan's

וּלְבֵ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> And [there was] of the house שָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul עֶ֙בֶד֙ <S%H5650><s%> a servant וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name צִיבָ֔א <S%H6717><s%> [was] Ziba וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> And when they had called ל֖וֹ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> him unto David וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about הַאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you צִיבָ֖א <S%H6717><s%> was Ziba וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servant

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king הַאֶ֨פֶס <S%H657><s%> [Is] there not ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> yet any לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְאֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that I may shew עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> the kindness אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said צִיבָא֙ <S%H6717><s%> unto him? And Ziba אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> hath yet a son לִיהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan נְכֵ֥ה <S%H5223><s%> [which is] lame רַגְלָֽיִם׃ <S%H7272><s%> on [his] feet

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said ל֥וֹ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֵיפֹ֣ה <S%H375><s%> unto him Where ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said צִיבָא֙ <S%H6717><s%> [is] he? And Ziba אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> Behold he [is] in the house מָכִ֥יר <S%H4353><s%> of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5988><s%> of Ammiel בְּל֥וֹ דְבָֽר׃ <S%H3810><s%> in Lodebar

וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then king דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיִּקָּחֵ֗הוּ <S%H3947><s%> and fetched מִבֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> him out of the house מָכִ֥יר <S%H4353><s%> of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5988><s%> of Ammiel מִלּ֥וֹ דְבָֽר׃ <S%H3810><s%> from Lodebar

וַ֠יָּבֹא <S%H935><s%> was come מְפִיבֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> Now when Mephibosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> he fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> on his face וַיִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and did reverence וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David מְפִיבֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> Mephibosheth וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Here עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> Behold thy servant

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said ל֨וֹ דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> unto him Fear כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עָשֹׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> not for I will surely אֶעֱשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> shew עִמְּךָ֥ <S%H5973><s%> with חֶ֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> thee kindness בַּֽעֲבוּר֙ <S%H5668><s%> the sake יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> for Jonathan אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father's וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֣י <S%H7725><s%> sake and will restore לְךָ֔ אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׂדֵ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> thee all the land שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> and you תֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> and thou shalt eat לֶ֛חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at שֻׁלְחָנִ֖י <S%H7979><s%> at my table תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> continually

וַיִּשְׁתַּ֕חוּ <S%H7812><s%> And he bowed וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> himself and said מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> What [is] thy servant כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for פָנִ֔יתָ <S%H6437><s%> that thou shouldest look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַכֶּ֥לֶב <S%H3611><s%> dog הַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> upon such a dead אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after כָּמֽוֹנִי׃ <S%H3644><s%> like

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about צִיבָ֛א <S%H6717><s%> to Ziba נַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> servant שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> that הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> all that pertained לְשָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> to Saul וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and to all his house נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> unto him I have given לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֲדֹנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H113><s%> unto thy master's

וְעָבַ֣דְתָּ <S%H5647><s%> shall till לּ֣וֹ אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲדָמָ֡ה <S%H127><s%> the land אַתָּה֩ <S%H859><s%> You וּבָנֶ֨יךָ <S%H1121><s%> Thou therefore and thy sons וַעֲבָדֶ֜יךָ <S%H5650><s%> and thy servants וְהֵבֵ֗אתָ <S%H935><s%> for him and thou shalt bring וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> may have לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֲדֹנֶ֤יךָ <S%H113><s%> in [the fruits] that thy master's לֶּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> may have food וַאֲכָל֔וֹ <S%H398><s%> to eat וּמְפִיבֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H4648><s%> but Mephibosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֲדֹנֶ֔יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy master's יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat תָּמִ֛יד <S%H8548><s%> alway לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at שֻׁלְחָנִ֑י <S%H7979><s%> at my table וּלְצִיבָ֗א <S%H6717><s%> Now Ziba חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> teen בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> servants

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said צִיבָא֙ <S%H6717><s%> Ziba אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king כְּכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יְצַוֶּ֜ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded אֲדֹנִ֤י <S%H113><s%> According to all that my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדּ֔וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> do עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> so shall thy servant וּמְפִיבֹ֗שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> As for Mephibosheth אֹכֵל֙ <S%H398><s%> [said the king] he shall eat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֻׁלְחָנִ֔י <S%H7979><s%> at my table כְּאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> as one מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

וְלִמְפִיבֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> And Mephibosheth בֵּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son קָטָ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> had a young וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name מִיכָ֑א <S%H4316><s%> [was] Micha וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all מוֹשַׁ֣ב <S%H4186><s%> And all that dwelt בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house צִיבָ֔א <S%H6717><s%> of Ziba עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> [were] servants לִמְפִיבֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H4648><s%> unto Mephibosheth

וּמְפִיבֹ֗שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> So Mephibosheth יֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <S%H7979><s%> table הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> at the king's תָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> continually ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֹכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> for he did eat וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> now he פִּסֵּ֖חַ <S%H6455><s%> and was lame שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> on both רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> his feet פ
